Author: Olderscout77

Comment: We will likely never know. The only way we will know is if Trump, Putin, or the translators reveal what was said. Of course most people would hesitate to take what Trump says at face value, most people would also hesitate to take what Putin says at face value, and translators are literally paid to NOT reveal what was said.  At this point it's old news so no one is wasting any time or effort trying to figure out what was said in the meeting 6 years ago.
Author: ProLifePanda

Comment: Never is a long time and we got all sorts of interesting info after the last Russian Revolution - confirmation that the Rosenbergs were Commie spies  springs to mind. If Putin's disaster in Ukraine continues and he falls out a window, the "new guy" might be happy to sell tRump to end the sanctions, esp as it gets less and less likely he'll ever be POTUS again.
Author: Olderscout77

Comment: Well to be fair, I did say LIKELY never know. I'd be willing to bet money on never getting any solid info on the meeting beyond what we already "know".  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Russia%E2%80%93United_States_summit  That has a pretty good summary of the summit and what we know was discussed there. But I'd question anything Trump and/or Putin says was discussed outside of what we already know. And we can be pretty confident whoever the US translator was/is professional enough to not divulge anything. And Putin's translator is likely in his pocket so it's unlikely to come out from there.  Can some details come out? Sure. Do I think it's likely? No. But even if information DOES come out, it's extremely unlikely to be something juicy. It isn't like Putin and Trump were discussing how to bring the US down. They likely hit on some high level topics, fawned over one another, and Putin let Trump ramble for 90 of the 120 minutes.
Author: ProLifePanda

Comment: >Your statement requires a slight modification:   >   >*It isn't like Putin and Trump were discussing how to bring the US down.* ***AND tRump KNEW WHAT WAS HAPPENING.*** Putin on the other hand knew EXACTLY what was happening. Author: Olderscout77
